DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Multiple Doses ZGN-433 Obese Female Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This protocol design test safety preliminary efficacy drug call ZGN-433 . It test ability reduce weight severely obese female subject post menopausal infertile .
DOC.criteria: Obese , otherwise healthy female Post menopausal infertile Weight ≥ 50 kg BMI ≥ 32 ≤ 45 kg/m2 Use weight loss agent past month History eat disorder History diabetes endocrine disorder History gastric bypass Current smoker Unstable body weight past 3 month
